communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

all correspondence (letters, emails), with attachments, between George Gauthier of the Evanston Housing Coalition (EHC) and any City of Evanston staff or elected/appointed officials from January 1, 2015 and the date this request is processed (inclusive of those dates).

all correspondence (letters, emails), with attachments, between Richard Koenig of the Housing Opportunity Development Corporation (HODC) and any City of Evanston staff or elected/appointed officials from January 1, 2015 and the date this request is processed (inclusive of those dates).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Niles Coalition

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

– all inspection reports
– all compliance schedule letters 
– all re-inspection date notifications

regarding buildings at 2014 Wesley, 2018 Wesley, and 2024 Wesley in Evanston from January 1, 2006 and the date this request is processed (inclusive of those dates).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Niles Coalition
